name: Soda Pop Skeet
description:
Made as a part of the Ope Game Jam 2019 (Theme: Pop). Developed during Minnesota deer hunting season. Figured even while hunting I could find the time for a little game development.

Make your choice in Soda Pop Skeet. Shoot the can labeled either soda or pop to earn points, but shooting the opposite can with cost you points. Make your choice of soda or pop and stick to it!

*Notice* Unfortunately only has mouse and keyboard support since I did not have a controller with me to test controller input.

Credits:
Design, Programming, and (Programmer) Art - Eli Knott
Aluminum Can Model: - Mihai Panait (https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/pepsi-new-design-3ds/546207)
